content: of chart round 3 k13 slm kf&b k to 1 before m k f&b slm k1 work row 5 of chart round 4 k to 2nd marker k1 work row 6 of chart repeat rnds 3&4 working respective chart row until you have 16 sts between markers you should now be on row 16 of the chart close thumb gusset k13 slm k3 bo13 slm you should have 2 thumb gusset sts on the right side of the bobble and 1 on the left side k1 work row 16 of chart k14 drop markers this round k2tog k1 work row 17 of chart continue working chart k all other sts after finishing chart k 1 row p 1 row k 1 row bobble all sts weave in ends owl mitts ©2009 sandy satre
